title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item for the first time.
 Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

OB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the item should be selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item and verify that the focus does not jump to the library file node.
